nodes.text: The Tetan monarchy was the planetary government that ruled the Empress Teta system throughout its history. The Tetan nobility consisted of several royal families, including the ruling Keto family. By the Imperial Era, the monarchy was led by Emperor Alor Keto, who was a puppet of the Mining Guild that controlled the planet. Alor's rightful heir was his niece, Eara Lota. The Tetan Guard protected the nobility, and were chosen from the most loyal of the system defense force.
